Find-Structures

Find-Structures.Rmd

Packages 

library(LearnEnglishWithAvatar)
library(dplyr)

Examples: Some structures 

# Of
target_of <- transcripts_atla %>% filter(find_structure(character_words, word = "of"))

# IF Conditions & Unless
target_if <- transcripts_atla %>% filter(find_structure(character_words, word = c("if", "unless")))

# That
target_that <- transcripts_atla %>% filter(find_structure(character_words, word = "that"))

# When
target_when <- transcripts_atla %>% filter(find_structure(character_words, word = "when"))

# Which
target_which <- transcripts_atla %>% filter(find_structure(character_words, word = "which"))

# What else
target_whatelse <- transcripts_atla %>% filter(find_structure(character_words, word = "what else"))

# Would
target_would <- transcripts_atla %>% filter(find_structure(character_words, word = c("would", "'d")))

target_would <- transcripts_atla %>% filter(find_structure(character_words, word = c("would like", "'d like", "would love", "'d love")))

Sample 

head(target_if %>% select(id, book, chapter, character, character_words))
#>    id  book                chapter character
#> 1  15 Water The Boy in the Iceberg     Sokka
#> 2  84 Water The Boy in the Iceberg      Aang
#> 3  97 Water The Boy in the Iceberg      Iroh
#> 4 102 Water The Boy in the Iceberg    Katara
#> 5 180 Water The Boy in the Iceberg    Katara
#> 6 197 Water The Boy in the Iceberg      Aang
#>                                                                                                                                                                                                                character_words
#> 1                                                                    Yeah, yeah, "an ancient art unique to our culture", blah, blah, blah. Look, I'm just saying  that if I had weird powers, I'd keep my weirdness to myself.
#> 2                                                                                                                                                                 Well, if you guys are stuck, Appa and I can give you a lift.
#> 3 I'm going to bed now.  Yep, a man needs his rest.  Prince Zuko, you need some sleep. Even if you're right, and the Avatar is alive, you won't find him. Your father, grandfather and great-grandfather all tried and failed.
#> 4                                                                                                                   I guess I was wondering, your being an airbender and all, if you had any idea what happened to the Avatar?
#> 5                                                                                                                                                    Hehehe, Aang, I'll help you catch a penguin if you teach me waterbending.
#> 6                                                                                                                                                                      If you want to be a bender, you have to let go of fear.
